Recommendation: Set clear boundaries for work hours and communicate them to your team.
Effect: Boundaries help prevent burnout and improve work-life balance.

Recommendation: Take short breaks every hour to stretch or walk.
Effect: Regular breaks reduce fatigue and boost productivity.

Recommendation: Keep up your positive habits and support colleagues when possible.
Effect: Positive routines help maintain low stress.

Recommendation: Use a task list or planner to organize your daily work.
Effect: Staying organized reduces stress and missed deadlines.

Recommendation: Maintain your support network and offer help to coworkers.
Effect: Helping others can boost your own morale.

Recommendation: Practice deep breathing or mindfulness for 5 minutes during breaks.
Effect: Mindfulness can help manage moderate stress.

Recommendation: Delegate tasks when possible and ask for help if needed.
Effect: Delegation prevents overload and builds teamwork.

Recommendation: Reflect on your achievements at the end of each week.
Effect: Recognizing progress boosts motivation.

Recommendation: Limit multitasking and focus on one task at a time.
Effect: Single-tasking improves efficiency and reduces errors.

Recommendation: Set realistic goals for each day and celebrate small wins.
Effect: Small wins build confidence and reduce stress.

Recommendation: Communicate openly with your manager about workload concerns.
Effect: Open communication can lead to better support.

Recommendation: Keep your workspace tidy to help you focus.
Effect: A clean space can reduce distractions and stress.

Recommendation: Schedule time for self-care activities after work.
Effect: Self-care helps you recharge and maintain well-being.

Recommendation: Practice gratitude by noting three positive things about your workday.
Effect: Gratitude can improve your outlook and job satisfaction.

Recommendation: Try gentle stretching or movement during long meetings.
Effect: Movement can reduce stiffness and improve mood.

Recommendation: Prepare a to-do list for the next day before leaving work.
Effect: Planning ahead reduces morning stress.

Recommendation: Ask for feedback to improve your performance and reduce uncertainty.
Effect: Feedback helps you grow and feel more secure.

Recommendation: Take a few minutes to connect with a coworker each day.
Effect: Social support at work can buffer stress.

Recommendation: Limit caffeine intake in the afternoon to improve sleep quality.
Effect: Better sleep supports work performance.

Recommendation: Visualize positive outcomes for challenging tasks.
Effect: Positive thinking can boost confidence and reduce anxiety.

Recommendation: Break large projects into smaller, manageable steps.
Effect: Small steps make big projects less overwhelming.

Recommendation: Keep emergency contacts easily accessible at work.
Effect: Quick access can be crucial in urgent situations.
